metadata.dc:author: Morfín-Maciel, Blanca María
metadata.dc:description: Some clinical reports suggest that allergic and reno-urinary diseases could be associated. Etiopathogenic aspects are described, as well as some clues of anamnesis that will help us to suspect allergic etiology.
metadata.dc:title: Correlación entre los trastornos reno-uretero-vesicales y la enfermedad alérgica.
[Correlation between renal-uretero-bladder diseases and allergies].
